```{r setup}
library(rcreg)
```

## Introduction

The `rcreg` package simplifies the analysis of repeated measures data using random coefficient regression models.

## Basic Usage

```{r}
data(sim_rcr)
mod <- rcr_fit(y ~ time + x1, data = sim_rcr, id = "id", time = "time",
               random = "intercept_slope")
rcr_summary(mod)
```

## Diagnostics

```{r, fig.width=6, fig.height=6}
rcr_diagnostics(mod)
```
